maxGenerationTokens.label: Max Gen Tokens
maxGenerationTokens.description: Maximum number of tokens to generate by the LLM in the chat completion. This value instructs the model how much output it is allowed to generate. For reasoning models (o1) this also includes tokens produced during internal reasoning.

maxPromptTokens.label: Max Input Tokens
maxPromptTokens.description: Maximum number of 'input' tokens to submit to LLM. This includes your latest message, the System Prompt, and previous conversation context messages (starting from most recent), as much as fits. For longer conversations which exceeded the limit, the earlier messages will not be included in next submission.

temperature.label: Temperature
temperature.description: What sampling temperature to use, between 0 and 2. Higher values like 0.8 will make the output more variable and explorative, lower values like 0.2 will make it more focused and deterministic. Not supported for o1-mini and o1-preview models.

presencePenalty.label: Presence Penalty
presencePenalty.description: Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalise new tokens based on whether they appear in the text so far, increasing the model's likelihood to talk about new topics. (Default: 0)

topP.label: Top-p
topP.description: An alternative to sampling with temperature. The model considers the results of the tokens with top p probability mass. So 0.1 means only the tokens in the top 10% probability mass are considered.

frequencyPenalty.label: Frequency Penalty
frequencyPenalty.description: Number between -2.0 and 2.0. Positive values penalise new tokens based on their existing frequency in the text so far, decreasing the model's likelihood to repeat the same line verbatim. (Default: 0)
